location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from the Horse Keeper, Driver and Sawar at Mount Aboo [Ābu] to Colonel Lewis Pelly, Agent to the Governor General for Rajpootana [Rājasthān], Mount Aboo

mods.abstract: Petition from four employees of the Rajpootana [Rājasthān] Agency, including a Horse Keeper, Driver and Sawar regarding their lack of expenses in order to purchase food and their unwillingness to go to Deesa [Dīsa] as instructed until they have been able to obtain some.
